3. Front-End: Analysis

The Cas13 Platform was developed for the rapid identification of highly conserved and potent guides for therapeutics.

Key Features

  • ✅ Run analyses interactively

  • ✅ Export results for downstream use

Supported Virus Genera

Currently available Genera: - Sarbecovirus - Merbecovirus - Enterovirus A71

Note

Identify guides the Virologist, Immunologist etc. wishes to test. The application detects the current Genera in the database.

Application structure

  • Overview

  • Conservation

Common Side Bar Features

Virus Genus contains the list of viral genus/subgenus in the frontend database

Rule Type: Showcases the types of rules processed. The default is the GG rule.

Drop down menu: Appearance Settings

1. Overview

Side Bar Features

Main panel

tab 1. Guide Table Summary - the opening section shows the total number of guides presented for further filtering

tab 2. Guide data:

  • Allows the user to do an initial exploration of the data

    • defaults:
